name: 汪昆立
objective: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
schedule:
1. Rules and Evalution
2. The Basics
3. Families of Carbon Compounds
4. Acid and Bases
5. Nomenclature and Conformations of Alkanes and Cycloalkanes
6. Stereochemistry
7. Nucleophilic Reactions
8. Middle Examination
9. Alkenes and Alkynes I
10. Alkenes and Alkynes II
11. Alkenes and Alkynes II
12. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance and Mass Spectrometry
13. Radical Reactions
14. Alcohols and Ethers
15. Alcohols and Ethers
16. Alcohols from Carbonyl Coumpounds
17. Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Usual activity  (20 points)
Middle Examination (30 points)
Final Examination (50 points)
Additional score (10 points)
materials:
Textbook“Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry”, Solomons/ Fryhle/ Synder, 12th Edition, ISBN 978-1-11992-317-6, Wiley, 2016, 歐亞書局代理
References“Organic Chemistry”, John McMurry, 9th Edition, ISBN 978-1-305-08048-5Cengage Learning, 2016, 歐亞書局代理
